> ::Zardus/Havoc/Repressor::
>
> Zardus nods, flying out of the way of several shots. "Yes, destroy that
bot,"
> he says, pointing to Mobster, "And then level that base," he points to the
> Mafia base.
>
> He looks at WarMachine as the gestalt seperates, frowning as he fires a
few
> shots at Mobster.

Mobster was not phased by the shots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Havoc trarnsforms into vehicle mode as WarMachine seperates, flying up and
> out of the way of a few shots.
>
> He dives at Mobster, dropping a bomb on the Gestalt.

Mobster is struck, and could not hold out without seperating, his robot mode
freezing up, he had to detach.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Repressor flies up away from the others as he regains controll when
> WarMachine seperates, his chopper blades sticking out of the back of his
> robot mode taking him upward.
>
> He aims his missile launcher at Mobster, firing two missiles.

Mobster is struck by the missiles while frozen and breaks up into the Mafia
again...
